document.full_text: barry bonds was convicted of obstructing justice after a trial over whether he lied about taking steroids. but the jury failed to reach a verdict on other counts.
document.title: bonds guilty of obstruction, but not of perjury
lines_and_colors: barry bonds was convicted of obstructing justice after a trial over whether he lied about taking steroids. but the jury failed to reach a verdict on other counts.
